page.title: 02VILLAGE AMENITIES CONT'D
page.content:
Harrold contd., On The Green are three buildings, a War Memorial, a l9th.century Lock-Up, and an l8th. century Butter Market.Surrounding the Green are many old buildings. Other facilities include a Lower School, Harrold Priory Middle School, a Fire Station, and a Doctor's Surgery. There are four churches; a Church of England where I go, a Roman Catholic, a United Reformed, and an Evangelical Church. I think that Harrold could do with a chemist, but I do not want to see any more houses built here as I like it this size. I like living in Harrold as there are always lots of things to do.
Rachel Quillen. 2D. Age ll.
